text: Is there hubl to print todays date?
ultimately looking to print the date 30 days from today (hubl if possible)
I think you can just add seconds to local_dt to select a day in the future
What are some good menu js libraries you have all used with the HubSpot menus? I know i've used pushyJS (with some heavy JS) with it but was wondering what anyone else has used?

Also, is there a way to just simply generate a simple ul>li listing of the menu without all the hs classes? it makes it hard to try and implement any additional type of menu libraries when you need to use a bunch of js to just strip out the HS stuff
Why strip out the HS stuff (just curious) rather than adding classes and placing menu styling for the new classes lower in the html ?
<@U25PYL3Q8|nickdeckerdevs> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/nickdeckerdevs/F6T4R5J07/pasted_image_at_2017_08_22_11_50_am.png|This is a menu I made work inside HubSpot>
The How We Do It is hidden, then I inject it into the what we do dropdown from teh main menu
<@U25PYL3Q8|nickdeckerdevs> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/nickdeckerdevs/F6RFW2DC1/two_menus_being_combined_into_one.js|two menus being combined into one>

<@U25PYL3Q8|nickdeckerdevs> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/nickdeckerdevs/F6S004KT5/pasted_image_at_2017_08_22_11_58_am.png|The blank url pages are the "titles", the ones that have blank titles actually show up and help give it that spacing>
Then the rest is all CSS.
<@U4RP6AGV9> I cant remember why I was stripping it out, but at the time, I think the classes were conflicting with the JS of the other script.
I'm having problems change the case of input fields on HubSpot forms.  It changes, but by the time the form submits it changes back.

I understand doing it is bad. I've come up with the solution that works the best for me, while having to do it because this is what the client wants.  I'm checking the field to see if there are any uppercase letters. If there are, then leave it alone, otherwise capital the first letter. This doesn't represent all solutions / cases but it is what I can live with
